creator: ANJU SIIMA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Are you worried about your expenses?
Are you worried about your income?
Are you worried about daily bills?

Then stay relaxed & Check out our new app "Spending Khatabook - My Expanse Money Tracker" to track your daily transactions.

Spending Khatabook Tracker is always complicated and most of the time you get to wonder where did all your money go and what are you spending all your savings on. In order to answer those questions we've created a very simple to use Personal Expanse Money Tracker application that focuses on quality, simplicity and user friendliness. Your financial wellness depends very much on how well organized you are with your spending but it also helps if you are keeping an eye close to your incomes and family budget.

Personal Expanse Money Tracker is a user-friendly, finance managing app which allows you to enter your expenses and income easily and quickly. Expense Money Tracker makes managing personal finances very easy. Now easily record your personal and business financial transactions, generate spending reports, review your daily, weekly and monthly financial data and manage your assets with Money Manager's spending tracker and budget planner. Expense Manager helps you track your financial activity efficiently.
Its simple design makes it lightweight, straightforward and very easy to use. It’s done in one click, because you don’t need to fill anything except the amount. You need just a few seconds daily to save the amount and each spending purpose. No matter where you are just a couple of taps will save your expense.

• Tracking expenses and incomes
• Split Transaction - Record all items in a single transaction with different category and amount
• Recurring expense and income
• Multiple accounts
• Tracking debts
descriptionShort: Spending Khata Book - My Expanse Money Tracker helps to organise daily life easy

title: Khata Book My Spending Tracker

creator: ANJU SIIMA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Track your business & personal transactions easily with Khata Book My Spending Tracker, the #1 accounting app.

Switch back to Khata Book Spending Tracker, the top-rated app for tracking your cash transactions, and say goodbye to manual bookkeeping, Hisab Kitab/Account Ledger/Credit Ledger book/ Bill book. Khata Book's intuitive interface makes it easy to manage your expenses and ledger accounts, even if you're not an accounting expert. Khata Book is simple pocket expenditure tracker and manage your businesses and personal money flow. This digital ledger book would help you easily maintain Bill book of customers and suppliers alike by allowing you to enter credit and debit records. Whether you're a Shopkeepers, small business owner or accountant, Khata Book's expense and ledger account management features are essential tools for keeping your finances organized.

—————————————————————————
WHY TO USE KHATA SPENDING TRACKER:
—————————————————————————
1. Simple and User-Friendly Interface
Experience hassle-free navigation and effortless data input with Khata Book's intuitive interface. No accounting expertise required.

2. Multiple Ledgers for Enhanced Organization
Stay organized by creating multiple ledgers for different business or personal accounts. Easily manage and track transactions separately.

3. Real-Time Balance Updates and Transaction History
Keep track of your finances with ease. Khata Book provides real-time balance updates and a detailed transaction history for each ledger, ensuring you're always informed.

4. Customizable Ledger Names and Categories
Tailor your ledgers to suit your specific business needs. Customize names and categories to accurately classify your transactions and simplify analysis.

5. PDF Export for Easy Bookkeeping
Streamline your bookkeeping process by exporting data in PDF format. Seamlessly share records with your accountant or store them for future reference.

——————————————————
UDHAR KHATA KEY-FEATURES
——————————————————
1. Effortless Transaction Tracking:
Seamlessly monitor your cash flow, record sales, and track expenses with ease. Khata Book's user-friendly interface ensures smooth navigation and hassle-free data input.

2. Multiple Ledgers for Comprehensive Management:
Create and manage multiple ledgers for various business or personal accounts. Keep your financial records organized and gain a comprehensive overview of your transactions.

3. Real-Time Updates and Transaction History:
Stay informed and up to date with real-time balance updates and access to detailed transaction history for each ledger. Gain valuable insights into your financial situation whenever you need them.

4. Customizable Ledger Names and Categories:
Tailor your ledgers to match your specific business requirements. Personalize names and categories to ensure accurate and meaningful record keeping.

5. Streamlined Record Maintenance:
Khata Book simplifies the process of maintaining bill books for your customers and suppliers. Easily enter credit and debit records, keeping track of all your financial interactions effortlessly.


KHATA SPENDING ACCOUNT MANAGER NEW-FEATURES

• Ledger account management tools allow you to easily track your business transactions.
• Multiple Business Profiles
• Cashflow tracker for Customers | Suppliers
• Ledger Book Reports for all type of Khatas
• Manage Khata Book Reports by Daily / Monthly / Yearly with custom filters
• Personal and Business Spending Khata book for mobile
• Export data in PDF with Cloud backup sync

KHATA ACCOUNTING TRACKER ADDITIONAL FEATURES

• Spending Tracker Ledger Manager
• Khata Ledger Spending Manager
• Ledger Cash Book Udhar Khatha
• Easy CashBook Sale & Purchases
• Automatic Backup and Data Sync
• Secure Login with Passcode and Fingerprint Authentication
• Detailed Record Keeping with Notes and Images

With its user-friendly features and comprehensive functionality, Khata Book My Spending Tracker is the ultimate tool for simplifying your financial management.
descriptionShort: Udhar Bahi Khata Tracker is your account manager to simplify ledger profit, loss

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are happy to announce our Khata Accounting Tracker coming with more features and improvements

📒 Added attachment feature for personal spendings
📒 Now navigate to previous date / month / year very easy
📒 Fixed add transaction issue when list categories are empty
📒 Fixed Pro-account access successful purchase takes to signup

Thank you for valuable support and love! We are expecting positive response from you!

title: Khata Book My Spending Tracker

creator: ANJU SIIMA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Track your business & personal transactions easily with Khata Book Spending Tracker, the #1 accounting app.

With Khata Tracker, the top-rated accounting tool, you can effortlessly keep track of both your personal and commercial expenditures.

Say goodbye to manual bookkeeping, Hisab Kitab/Account Ledger/Credit Ledger book/Bill book, and return to Khata Tracker, the best tool for tracking your cash transactions.

————————————————————————
WHY TO USE KHATA SPENDING TRACKER
————————————————————————
1. Simple and User-Friendly Interface
Experience hassle-free navigation and effortless data input with our user-friendly interface. You don't need to be an accounting expert to manage your expenses effectively.

2. Multiple Ledgers for Enhanced Organization
Stay organized by creating multiple ledgers for different business or personal accounts. Easily manage and track transactions separately, ensuring accurate financial records.

3. Real-Time Balance Updates and Transaction History
Keep a close eye on your finances with real-time balance updates and a detailed transaction history for each ledger. Stay informed about your financial situation at all times.

——————————————————
KHATA TRACKER KEY-FEATURES
——————————————————
1. Effortless Transaction Tracking:
Seamlessly monitor your cash flow, record sales, and track expenses with ease. Our user-friendly interface ensures smooth navigation and hassle-free data input.

2. Multiple Ledgers for Comprehensive Management:
Create and manage multiple ledgers for various business accounts. Keep your financial records organized and gain overview of your transactions.

3. Real-Time Updates and Transaction History:
Stay informed and up to date with real-time balance updates and access to detailed transaction history for each ledger. Gain valuable insights into your financial situation whenever you need them.

4. Customizable Ledger Names and Categories:
Tailor your ledgers to match your specific business requirements. Personalize names and categories to ensure accurate and meaningful record keeping.

5. Streamlined Record Maintenance:
Khata Book simplifies the process of maintaining bill books for your customers and suppliers. Easily enter credit and debit records, keeping track of all your financial interactions effortlessly.


KHATA ACCOUNTING MANAGER EXCITING FEATURES

• Ledger Account Management Tools: Easily track your business transactions with our advanced ledger account management tools.

• Multiple Business Profiles: Manage multiple business profiles within the app, allowing you to separate and organize your financial data effectively.

• Cashflow Tracker for Customers | Suppliers: Keep track of your cashflow from both your customers and suppliers.

• Ledger Book Reports for All Types of Khatas: Generate ledger book reports for all your Khatas, providing you with valuable insights into your financial performance.

• Manage Khata Book Reports by Daily/Monthly/Yearly: Customize your Khata Book reports by filtering them daily, monthly, or yearly, giving you a clear snapshot of your financial progress.

• Export Data in PDF with Cloud Backup Sync: Streamline your bookkeeping by exporting your data in PDF format. Additionally, enjoy the convenience of cloud backup sync, keeping your financial data safe and accessible.

BUSINESS ACCOUNT EXPENSE MANAGER ADDITIONAL FEATURES

• Spending Tracker Ledger Manager: Efficiently manage your spending with our dedicated ledger manager, allowing you to track expenses with ease.

• Khata Ledger Manager: Keep a close eye on your Khata ledger and manage your financial interactions, ensuring accurate record keeping.

• Ledger Cash Book Udhar Khatha: Simplify your cash management with our ledger cash book feature.

Our Khata Book Spending Tracker is the ultimate tool for simplifying your financial management. Say goodbye to manual bookkeeping and start effortlessly tracking your transactions today!
descriptionShort: Udhar Bahi Khata Tracker is your account manager to simplify ledger profit, loss

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are happy to announce our Khata Account Management Tracker coming with more features and improvements

• Now SAVE transactions history in Excel & PDF format to Phone or Tablet
• Fixed Adding values in decimal
• Added category wise sum-calculations with history
• Added tools with many useful business financial calculators
• Improved customised filters with multiple categories selection

Thank you for valuable support and love! We are expecting positive response from you!

title: Khata Book Spending Tracker

creator: ANJU SIIMA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
descriptionHtml:
Track your business & personal transactions easily with Khata Book Spending Tracker, the #1 accounting app.

Khata Book Spending Tracker is used by small, medium, and big businesses. It is particularly helpful for business owners and medium-sized businesses who make credit and business transactions. For your business, Khata Book Spending Tracker is a 100% free, safe, and secure ledger book that is incredibly easy to use.

- 100% Free, Safe, and Secure for all types of businesses.
- 10X easier to manage your business and time from anywhere, anytime.
- Manage all your business transactions, Non-GST/GST bills, inventory, sale & purchases with a phone

————————————————————————
WHY TO USE KHATA SPENDING TRACKER
————————————————————————

1. User-Friendly Interface: The app offers a simple, easy-to-use interface for effortless expense management, suitable for users of all levels of accounting expertise.

2. Multiple Ledgers: Users can create various ledger accounts, whether for business or personal use, ensuring well-organized and accurate financial records.

3. Real-Time Updates: Stay informed about your finances with real-time balance updates and access to detailed transaction history for each ledger, providing constant visibility into your financial situation.

——————————————————
KHATA TRACKER KEY-FEATURES
——————————————————
1. Effortless Transaction Tracking: Easily monitor cash flow, record sales, and track expenses with a user-friendly interface for smooth navigation and data input.

2. Multiple Ledgers for Comprehensive Management: Create and manage multiple ledgers for different business accounts, keeping your financial records organised.

3. Real-Time Updates and Transaction History: Stay informed with real-time balance updates and access to detailed transaction history for each ledger, providing valuable insights into your financial situation.

4. Customizable Ledger Names and Categories: Personalize ledger names and categories to match your business requirements, ensuring accurate and meaningful record-keeping.

5. Streamlined Record Maintenance: Simplify bill book maintenance for customers and suppliers. Easily record credit and debit transactions, keeping track of all financial interactions effortlessly.


CREDIT ACCOUNTING MANAGER EXCITING FEATURES

• Ledger Account Management Tools: Easily track business transactions with advanced ledger account management tools.

• Multiple Business Profiles: Manage multiple business profiles in the app to effectively organize and separate financial data.

• Cash Flow Tracker: Keep tabs on cash flow from both customers and suppliers.

• Ledger Book Reports: Generate ledger book reports for all types of Khata to gain valuable financial insights.

• Customized Reports: Customize Khata Book reports by filtering them daily, monthly, or yearly for a clear snapshot of financial progress.

• Export Data: Streamline bookkeeping by exporting data in PDF format and ensuring data safety and accessibility through cloud backup sync.

BUSINESS ACCOUNT EXPENSE MANAGER ADDITIONAL FEATURES

• Spending Tracker Ledger Manager: Efficiently manage your spending with our dedicated ledger manager, allowing you to track expenses with ease.

• Khata Ledger Manager: Keep a close eye on your Khata ledger and manage your financial interactions, ensuring accurate record keeping.

• Ledger Cash Book Udhar Khatha: Simplify your cash management with our ledger cash book feature.

- Simple features manage your payments, business ledgers, business invoices, stock & bills
- Get paperless business loans for your business with easy repayment options
- Secure all your business data with automatic backup - 100% safe and secure

Anybody managing finances, whether they are a person, business, or residence, can utilize Khata Book Spending Tracker.

Our Khata Book Spending Tracker is the ultimate tool for simplifying your financial management.

Complete Accounting Web Application 🌐
Visit here:- https://www.khatatracker.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
2024 Khata Book / Accounting managers don't wait to track your expenses here!

New update available :
- Added AppLock feature with Passcode along with Fingerprint and Face ID
- Improved signup user experience
- Added Delete Account functionality in the app itself.

As a valuable customer, your feedback is most important for us to improve our app quality day by day. Thank you for your valuable suggestions.
